alert.note: Alert for Bedford; Botetourt; Rockbridge (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 18 at 1:24PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central Rockbridge, central Bedford and east central Botetourt Counties through 200 PM EDT... At 123 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Thaxton, or near Bedford, moving northeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Bedford... Big Island... Coleman Falls... Chamblissburg... Peaks Of Otter Summit... Peaks Of Otter Recreation Area... and Sedalia. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
